thread.title: US gymnasts unveil accusations of abuse by doctor | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: US gymnasts unveil accusations of abuse by doctor | Daily Mail Online

author: Emily Crane For Dailymail.Com
title: US gymnasts unveil accusations of abuse by doctor | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad Three former Team USA gymnasts come forward to describe their horrifying sexual abuse at the hands of the team doctor as he faces trial - and say they stayed silent out of fear of their tyrannical trainers Jamie Dantzscher, Jessica Howard and Jeanette Antolin claim they were sexually abused by Team USA gymnastics doctor Lawrence Nassar The women revealed allegations of abuse on CBS 60 Minutes on Sunday night Dantzscher, a Sydney Olympics medalist, claims abuse started in 1995 aged 13 She claims Nassar put his fingers inside her vagina to treat her back pain Women claim abuse happened at Karolyi Ranch in Texas - a Team USA training camp run by coaches Bela and Martha Karolyi Attorney John Manly more than 40 women in a lawsuit against USA Gymnastics for failing to protect his clients Nassar was arrested in November on child sexual assault charges in Michigan He denied allegations saying he only conducted legitimate medical procedures Published: 02:48 GMT, 20 February 2017 | Updated: 06:59 GMT, 20 February 2017 499 shares
